titleStmt.title: A true copy of the Lord Andevers two speeches to the Lords in Parliament; the one concerning the Star-Chamber; the other concerning the pacification: both which were formerly corrupted and abused by a false copy printed.
titleStmt.author: Berkshire, Charles Howard, Earl of, ca. 1615-1679.

titleStmt.title: A true copy of the Lord Andevers two speeches to the Lords in Parliament; the one concerning the Star-Chamber; the other concerning the pacification: both which were formerly corrupted and abused by a false copy printed.
titleStmt.author: Berkshire, Charles Howard, Earl of, ca. 1615-1679.

notesStmt.note: Composed of two speeches. The second is Thomason E.196[41] and is titled "A true copy of the Lord Andevers speech to the Lords in Parliament, concerning the pacification.".
Annotation on Thomason copy: "March. 6th 1640"; the second 1 in the imprint is crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
